definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The manual said it was self-cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 使用手冊上說它是自動清理的。

sentences.english: The significanceof these questions will be discussed later in this booklet.
sentences.chinese: 本手冊後面會探討這些問題的意義。

sentences.english: Where is the dyna-drill which you repaired?
sentences.chinese: 這就是他忘記帶走的那本鑽井手冊。

sentences.english: Check your owner's manual for the vehicle's oil capacity and drain plug location.
sentences.chinese: 檢查你的業主手冊，獲得汽車的油容量和放油塞位置。

sentences.english: They all curate exhibitions, publish books and catalogs , and organize conferences and symposia.
sentences.chinese: 他們策劃展覽，出版書籍和手冊，組織會議和論壇。

sentences.english: Read the documentation or manual that your company provides.
sentences.chinese: 親自讀讀你公司提供的文檔或是手冊。

sentences.english: Please see the user's manual for a more thorough explanation.
sentences.chinese: 請看用戶使用手冊來獲取更多信息。

sentences.english: Chinese Students & Scholars Society The Ohio State University …
sentences.chinese: 柏林洪堡大學中國學生指導手冊。

sentences.english: The mother and child manual taken to find out from the drawer of niche for Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 帶着從佛龕的抽屜中找到的母子手冊。

sentences.english: Development of intelligent on-line operation manual.
sentences.chinese: 開發智能在線操作手冊。

sentences.english: Refer to the installation guide of temperature controller.
sentences.chinese: 參見溫控器安裝指導手冊。

sentences.english: I always keep the handbook at hand.
sentences.chinese: 我總是把那本手冊放在手邊。

sentences.english: Design and production of brochures, booklets , name cards etc.
sentences.chinese: 各種出版物的設計及印務，如小冊子，手冊，名片等。

sentences.english: The WARNING heading in a manual explains dangers that might result in per sonal injury or death.
sentences.chinese: 手冊中的警告標題說明會導致人員傷亡的危險。

sentences.english: A Beijing Cultural Tours Manual in multiple languages shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 印製兼具中外文的《北京文化旅遊手冊》。

definition: (technical) manual/(book of) directions/synopsis (of a play or film)/specification (patent)/CL:本[ben3]
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
